events.title: Inspirathon
events.description: Inspirathon is a 24hr hackathon where the participants are expected to make web apps/applications as a solution for the chosen problem statement. It is also the flagship event of Inspirus.

events.title: Retrieval Sages
events.description: Solving interactive analytical challenges & logical puzzles ultimately boiling down to test the abilities & coding skills of a team in a high-stakes situation of running time.

events.title: Code Wars
events.description: A completely technical event that involves coding in C++, divided into 3 different rounds. The event includes blind coding, debugging, and other C++ language-based questions.

events.title: Jigsaw Coding
events.description: You will be given code snippets, you have to combine them to make logical code that solves the given problem statement.

events.title: UI UX Design
events.description: Create intuitive, user-friendly interfaces within a set time. Can your innovation and creativity give the best user experience?

events.title: Explorer's Quest (Treasure Hunt)
events.description: A frantic affair, this event has all the best parts of a quiz combined with the manic frenzy of a treasure hunt. Participants will have to answer questions and solve riddles, and they'll have to run around and use all their skills.

events.title: Reel Ad making (Reel it Feel it)
events.description: Make an Instagram reel out of a given, (very silly) fake product. Best reel wins.

events.title: Framed (Online)
events.description: An online digital photography competition. Open to students throughout India.

events.title: Rubix Cube
events.description: FASTEST TIME TO SOLVE THE CUBE WINS.

events.title: Escapium (Escape room)
events.description: Test your puzzle-solving skill in a race against time to escape the room.

events.title: Leisure Lounge
events.description: A place of fun games, friendly competitions with your friends.

events.title: Meme Off
events.description: Let your creativity shine and tickle the audience's funny bone with your meme-making skills.
